name: Treasure Island (itch) (University of Chester Games Development)
name_original: Treasure Island (itch) (University of Chester Games Development)
description:
Venture out and collect coins whilst battling other players. Use items and bump mechanics, to steal from an opponent’s currently held coins and rush them back to your base. Stay on top of the economy, and make sure your bank has the most deposited coins before the time runs out!

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

This game was created by one level 5 student for a multiplayer game design module. Students learn about multiplayer game and level design before creating their own multiplayer game.

CONTROLS

  • Left analog stick: Movement
  • Right analog stick: Aim item
  • Right trigger: Use item
  • Start button: Pause game

REQUIREMENTS

  • Windows PC
  • 2-4 x Compatible gamepads (Xbox 360 or Xbox One controller preferably. Local multiplayer only.

TEAM MEMBERS

  • 1 x Level 5 Student

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.
